value:
$WmMPID_比翼ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|Phew... And that's that for this house.
Everyone looks so cute sound asleep!
Good night, everyone! Sweet dreams!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Let's hurry, Peony. You said you
wanted to give everyone a good
first dream of the year, right?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|No need to rush it, Triandra!$k$pAnyway, so, at the next place...
we'll have to go in through the
window...verrrrry quietly...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|*sniffle*$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|Oh no... I can hear a little girl crying.
I wonder what's happened?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Everyone else is celebrating with
their mommy and daddy! Wh-why
can't we?!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Don't cry... Mom and Dad passed
away, remember? I'm sad too, but...
it's not something we can change.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|No! I... I want Mommy and Daddy!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|I feel bad... Just wait a little longer,
dears. I'll give you a dream where
you can be with your mom and dad!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Peony, stop.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Huh? Why? I have to give them both
a happy dream for their first dream
of the year!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Not even the happiest dream will
change the reality that awaits them.
It will only hurt them more.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|That can't be true! Happy dreams
leave the dreamer with a lingering
happiness even after they end!$k$pAND even if it's only a dream, I can
still help her have a happy memory
of her parents.$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Memories in dreams are not the same
as reality, Peony. It would be cruel.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Grrrr... How could I expect you to
understand, Triandra?!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Wh-what? You're the one that
doesn't seem to get it.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Ugh! There's no use talking to you
about it! ...Hmph!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|So it would seem!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_年明プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_NewYear21,Face|Happy New Yea— Oh? Something
happen between the two of you?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|No.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Nothing to worry about!$k$p$WmMPID_年明プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_NewYear21,Face|Well... All right, then.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|We lost... No doubt due to your
absentmindedness.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|My what?! Triandra, you—$k$p$WmMPID_年明プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_NewYear21,Face|Hm... Starting the new year off
on the right foot, I see.$k$p$Sbs150|
